title: low x-height
content:
I’m looking for a couple of good, crisp serif fonts with low x-height and several weights.

 [‹ American Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001322/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41567 "Go to previous forum topic") [Aurelio - thinking of resurrecting this serif project ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001322/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43845 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Florence

comments.content: Anything else? Is this for a book? Magazine? An Ad? What kind of sensibility? Sans? Serif?
